$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|Aha—my prey! I must sacrifice you
on my way to producing an awesome
video worthy of Hollywood screens!$k$p$WmMPID_霧亜,ch12_04_Kiria_F_Normal,Face|Ellie—wait! Look around you!$k$p$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|And we'll obviously need someone
to play the fashionable young woman
who wears only the cutest clothes...$k$p$WmMPID_霧亜,ch12_04_Kiria_F_Normal,Face|...What was that?$k$p$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Kiria! You'll be perfect for the
part. And you'll get to wear this
cute, frilly dress, and—$k$p$WmMPID_霧亜,ch12_04_Kiria_F_Normal,Face|All right. Point me toward the enemy
Mirages. We're going to win this!$k$p$WmMPID_まもり,ch12_03_Mamori_F_Normal,Face|...This is getting silly.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|Gah! And after I worked so hard
to set the stage for a performance
worthy of the big screen...$k$p$WmMPID_霧亜,ch12_04_Kiria_F_Normal,Face|Ugh... But my cute, frilly dress...$k$p$WmMPID_まもり,ch12_03_Mamori_F_Normal,Face|Retreat already, you two!$k$p$Sbs150|
